title: Hearty fruit cake
ingredients: ['110g (4 oz) margarine', '170ml (6 fl oz) water', '170g (6 oz) soft brown sugar', '450g (1 lb) mixed dried fruit', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '2 eggs, beaten', '340g (12 oz) self raising flour, sifted', '1 teaspoon mixed spice', '110g (4 oz) glace cherries']
